alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha; Jefferson; Lincoln (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued March 01 at 11:15PM CST until March 02 at 1:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CST THURSDAY FOR ARKANSAS, NORTHWESTERN DESHA, CENTRAL JEFFERSON AND NORTHERN LINCOLN COUNTIES... At 1115 PM CST, Doppler radar indicated thunderstorms producing heavy rain across the warned area. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms. SOURCE...Radar. IMPACT...Flash flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses as well as other poor drainage and low-lying areas. Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pine Bluff, Pea Ridge, Altheimer, Gould, Gillett, Humphrey, Grady, Almyra, St. Charles, Watson, Langford, Little Bayou Meto Park, Woodville, Douglas, Richardson, Whitefield, Linwood, De Witt, Madding and Cottondale. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR INDICATED
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
